Module com.cs2212.cardbound
Package com.cs2212.cardbound.system

Class AudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.cs2212.cardbound.system.AudioPlayer
public class AudioPlayer extends Object
A static class that plays various audio clips and applies various effects to them.
Since:
3/29/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jacob Couture
